author: Julia Alexander
title: NBCUniversal officially enters the streaming wars with Peacock launch
description: Comcast and NBCUniversal’s big streaming debut arrives on April 15th with the launch of Peacock — but only for Comcast customers. The rest of the country will have to wait until July 15th, as the company previously announced.
content:
Rolling out to Comcast X1 and Flex customers on April 15th
With much of the United States forced to stay inside and looking for any kind of entertainment to make the days go by faster, NBCUniversal couldnt have picked a better time to launch its new Peacock … [+6041 chars]
